name: Tom H. MacFarland
content: Thomas MacFarland | College of Computing, AI, and Cybersecurity | Nova Southeastern University Our Faculty and Staff Computing, AI, and Cybersecurity People Thomas MacFarland Thomas MacFarland Title: Senior Research Associate Department: Office of Institutional Effectiveness College/Division: Office of the Provost and Academic Affairs Email: tommac@nova.edu Dr. MacFarland joined the Graduate School of Computer and Information Sciences in 1988 and has been on administrative leave since 1994 in the University's Office of Institutional Research. In this capacity, he provides consulting services to the University community on research methods and statistical design as well as individual research on institutional concerns and assessment of student learning. Research Areas Institutional research, assessment of student learning outcomes, Federal data resources, K-12 computer science education. Â©
